name: Gels Galore
description:
NOTICE: This was posted on my previous itch.io account (https://hydroflame.itch.io/gels-galore), but I forgot the password, so I'm reuploading it here.

Use your bouncy blue gel and your slippery orange gel to try to complete the puzzles!

CONTROLS

Blue Gel - Left Click

Orange Gel - Right Click
